pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern of New Zealand | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau today spoke with Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern of New Zealand.

The two leaders exchanged views on multilateral issues of mutual concern, including ways to advance a progressive trade agenda and the promotion of human rights.

The prime ministers also discussed the importance of supporting the rules-based international order.  

The two leaders expressed their desire to meet in the near future.
